4.å¯é€‰å‚æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœage å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸¤è€…ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›name
function getinfo(name:string,age?:number):string{
    if(age){
        return `${name}+${age}`
    }else{
        return '${name}'
    }
}

    }

13.ts ä¸­çš„ç»§æ‰¿ //å…³é”®å­— extendsã€super
